attributes.action: Make 25th June a Public Holiday to Celebrate the Life & Work of Michael Jackson
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Possibly the world’s most well known man, Michael Jackson leaves a legacy of changing the world as he passed away on 25th June 2009 at the UCLA Medical Center.

Michael has not only achieved worldwide success, but has helped thousands of people in need by donating millions to charities.

A national holiday would celebrate the life, 45 year career and most of all, generosity of Michael Jackson.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
